_description: James Ryman, a song of the Annunciation — seven 4-line stanzas (abab) and 4-line burden: ‘A meyden mylde hath born a chylde / Mankynde ayene to by / Hys name ihesu ys callyd thus / And here name mylde mary’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O man of molde mekely beholdeHou god mankynd hath
                    take…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Thatt nowe to us hath born IhesusAnd she neuere
                    defylde
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 291.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 181; 1977, 160.
